Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets and Bulls combined to miss 150 3-point shots in two head-to-head matchups, setting a record.
Others: NBA fans are flabbergasted by the sheer volume of missed 3-point shots from the Hornets and Bulls, who do not have a legitimate 3-point threat.
Fans are blaming the high number of 3s as the main reason for declining NBA ratings.
Shaquille O'Neal attributes the decline in NBA viewership to the way teams play due to Steph Curry's influence.
